sections.description: (Required) Plugin description. Basic HTML can be used in all sections.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  • Upload the 'mos-testimonial' folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory or install via the WP admin panel
  • Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
  • That's it.
sections.custom_section: This is a custom section labeled 'Custom Section'.
